code: import DaumPostcode from'react-daum-postcode';import React,{useState}from"react";import Modal from"react-modal";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PostCode=props=>{const[flag,setFlag]=useState(false);const[cPost,setCpost]=useState('');const[cAddr1,setCaddr1]=useState('');const[cAddr2,setCaddr2]=useState('');const customStyles={overlay:{backgroundColor:"rgba(0,0,0,0.5)"},content:{left:"0",margin:"auto",width:"350px",height:"500px",padding:"0",overflow:"hidden"}};const handleComplete=data=>{let fullAddress=data.address;let extraAddress='';console.log(data);if(data.addressType==='R'){if(data.bname!==''){extraAddress+=data.bname;}if(data.buildingName!==''){extraAddress+=extraAddress!==''?", ".concat(data.buildingName):data.buildingName;}fullAddress+=extraAddress!==''?" (".concat(extraAddress,")"):'';setCpost(data.zonecode);setCaddr1(data.roadAddress);}setFlag(false);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col mx-2 base_text my-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"sub_title pb-1 pl-2",children:"\uC8FC\uC18C"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex base_text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-[150px] h-[40px] border rounded-lg flex items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"ml-4",children:cPost===''?'우편번호':cPost})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:e=>setFlag(!flag),className:"button_on ml-8 flex justify-center items-center",children:"\uC6B0\uD3B8\uBC88\uD638 \uAC80\uC0C9"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"h-[40px] border rounded-lg mt-4 flex items-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"ml-4",children:cAddr1===''?'주소1':cAddr1})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:'text',onChange:e=>setCaddr2(e.target.value),value:cAddr2,className:"input mt-4",placeholder:"\uC0C1\uC138\uC8FC\uC18C"}),flag&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{isOpen:flag,ariaHideApp:false,style:customStyles,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex border-b bg-[#32A086]",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"ml-auto px-4 py-2 text-white font-normal",onClick:e=>setFlag(false),children:"\uB2EB\uAE30"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DaumPostcode,{onComplete:handleComplete,style:{height:'100%'}})]})]});};export default PostCode;
